name: Journey of the Fyra Birds
description:
Food and shelter is getting scarce, the Fyra birds must migrate in order to find a new suitable home. You will aid the Fyra birds on their journey over the ocean by taking control of a flock. Danger lurks throughout this journey. Can you help the Fyra birds safely cross the ocean?

Music  and audio has been provided by: gHSTS & gUITARS.

The Main Menu theme "sKYE", recorded live on Calton Hill in Edinburgh (Scotland), can be listened to on SoundCloud:

https://soundcloud.com/ghstsnguitars/skye-loop-calton-hill-8-5-14
